sentences.english: The buzz droids are designed to disable, not destroy, enemy craft.
sentences.chinese: 蜂鳴機器人的設計目的是癱瘓，而非摧毀敵機。

sentences.english: A nursing bed which can disassemble and assemble flexibly and used for paralytic relates to a bed.
sentences.chinese: 可靈活拆裝的癱瘓病人護理牀，它涉及一種牀。

sentences.english: The forth episode of the coiled. riot, Eveline vividly demonstrates a kind of emotion paralysis in Dublin youngsters.
sentences.chinese: 生動地表現了都柏林青年人癱瘓的精神狀態。

sentences.english: There were no cases of neurologic deterioration or paralysis after TES.
sentences.chinese: TES術後，沒有患者出現神經功能惡化或癱瘓。

sentences.english: Watanabe's father is paralyzed, and he needs a machine to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 渡邊的父親癱瘓在牀，需要靠儀器維持呼吸。

sentences.english: Hatred paralyzes life; love release it.
sentences.chinese: 恨使生活癱瘓無力，愛使他重獲新生。

sentences.english: Reeve was paralyzed in a horseback riding accident in 1995.
sentences.chinese: 裏夫在1995年騎馬事故中受傷癱瘓。

sentences.english: He searched for a lover for his wife after he became paralyzed, is he a wretch or a true man?
sentences.chinese: 癱瘓後，他爲他的妻子找情人，是窩囊廢還是純爺們？

sentences.english: Instead they carried their paralyzed friend up the outside stairs to the top of the flat roof.
sentences.chinese: 他們擡着癱瘓的朋友上了外面的樓梯，到達平的屋頂。

sentences.english: Our goal is to make life as normal as possible for people with paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 我們的目標是使癱瘓的人擁有跟正常人一樣的生活。

sentences.english: It may result in loss of consciousness , paralysis or death .
sentences.chinese: 這可能導致意識喪失，癱瘓或死亡。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 輝和蓉相親相愛，但自從輝受傷後，下半身完全癱瘓。

sentences.english: But learning to live with his "paralysis" wasn't the same as resigning himself to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是學會生活在癱瘓中與接受癱瘓這個現實相去徑庭。

sentences.english: But learning to live with his "paralysis" wasn't the same as resigning himself to it.
sentences.chinese: 但是學會生活在癱瘓中與接受癱瘓這個現實相去徑庭。

sentences.english: The taxation system of businesses and income tax is completely broken and non-functional.
sentences.chinese: 企業和個人所得稅稅務體系完全是癱瘓的，不起作用。

sentences.english: Neurovascular free muscle transfer combined with crossface nerve grafting for the treatment of facial paralysis in children.
sentences.chinese: 跨面吻合血管神經的背闊肌移植一期治療面神經癱瘓。

definition: to lead to/to create/to cause/to bring about
to be related/to entail/to involve/joint (liability etc)
(of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
